title: Has anybody in history ever died of laughter? - Quora

response.answer_text: There was a story making the rounds that a sketch on The Goodies (Scotsman and bagpipe fighting hand to hand kung fu style) so tickled an elderly viewer with a heart condition that he laughed so hard he had a fatal attack. Never verified as far as I know, so high probability it is an urban legend.
Technically, yes. Redd Foxx died onstage of a heart attack while everybody laughed because they thought he was doing a reenactment from Sanford and Son.
